title: Ookami ga Kuru!
original_name: オオカミが来る！GIB MIR SONNE
sinopse:
In order to investigate the strange phenomenon occurring in Northern Bayern, Germany, the church (KIRCHE) have dispatched the slayer Sirius. He rescues a young woman, Beate, who was being attacked by zombies. However, as the two attempt to leave, they’re attacked by more zombies...

(Source: Aerandria)
